roleset.name: Problematic state

role.descr: stimulus of problematic state - thing that is a problem
experiencer of problematic state - who has a problem with Arg0

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to issue.02-n. No VN class. No FN class. Framed by Katie.

example.name: family causes the problem for the patient
example.text: These family matters caused the patient more anxiety.
